text: +marty13612 the original tracks felt darker and more original. The provided some of the game's character so changing them was a big deal. I wish they had kept the old ones involved, maybe shuffling them in at random.

text: Afterbirth feels like an entirely new game, and this song, it sets up Binding of Isaac's mood perfectly, depressing, terrifying, and just outright disturbing, sounds like something out of Last of Us, both the song and mood. GG edmund, G f**king G.
